title: Cannondale x Palace Mad Boy is the wild commuter bike of your dreams
content:

But for those who want to leave the lycra (and dropbars) at home, Cannondale has a new Palace-themed creation that will leave your wallet (kinda) empty. Appropriately called the Mad Boy, the bike is a hyped up version of their
